parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description: Configuration in which to supress the equation is (Nothing or null for the current configuration)

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: True suppresses the equation, false unsuppresses it

title: IEquationMgr.ChangeSuppressionForConfiguration
description: Changes the suppression state of an equation in the specified configuration.
signature:
System.Int32 ChangeSuppressionForConfiguration( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.String
ConfigName
,
   System.Boolean
State
)

parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description: Configuration in which to supress the equation is (Nothing or null for the current configuration)

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: True suppresses the equation, false unsuppresses it

returns: Index of the equation; -1 if error of if the equation is created in SOLIDWORKS 2014 or later
